titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Berkeley College, Yale University, Records of the Master
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:43

did.unittitle: Berkeley College, Yale University, records of the master

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence and administrative files documenting the students and activities of the master of Berkeley College, Yale University. Also included are Robert Triffin's records on the Yale Class of 1969 Legal Defense Fund.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 13-C-2 (YRG 13-C-2), Records of the master of Berkeley College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Berkeley College, Yale University, Records of the Master (RU 441). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence and administrative files documenting the students and activities of the master of Berkeley College, Yale University. Also included are Robert Triffin's records on the Yale Class of 1969 Legal Defense Fund.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The title "Master" for chief executive officers of residential colleges was changed to "Head of College" in April of 2016.

did.unittitle: Subject files and summer session records

odd.head: General
odd.p: See also: box 3, James Gamble Rogers

accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
